title: In good company
creator_credit: Syd Wood, Frank Killian and Movietonenews
brief_description: Role and training in Australian Citizen Military Forces of part-time soldiers important in Australia’s defence; attendance at weekly parades, weekend bivouacs and annual camps where modern weapons, mock-up battles are used to provide realistic battle and trade experience. Army medical nurses, Women’s Royal Australian Army Corps, and Commandos learn bandaging, marching and boat-handling respectively as they train. Commentator: Kevin Golsby.
